Cosmic Loom Theory
  • Changelog
  • View page source

Changelog

All notable changes to Cosmic Loom Theory will be documented here.

The format is based on Keep a Changelog.

[1.1.0] - 2025-01-26

Phase 1 Complete - Core CLT Physics

Added

  • Energy Resistance (éR) Visualizer - Interactive phase space showing viable window

  • 2D Loomfield Wave Simulator - Real-time wave propagation with matplotlib

  • 3D Loomfield Visualizer - Volumetric rendering with plotly (web-based)

  • Real-Time 3D Simulator - Desktop application with vispy/OpenGL

  • Q Metric - Energy-independent coherence measurement

  • C_bio Observable - Consciousness metric (Q² × activity for 2D, Q³ for 3D)

  • Presets - Healthy, Pathology, and Healing scenarios

  • Absorbing Boundaries - Mur’s method for wave equation

  • CI/CD Pipeline - GitHub Actions for testing and documentation

  • Sphinx Documentation - API reference and tutorials

Fixed

  • Click vs drag detection in 3D visualizer

  • Coordinate scaling for isosurface rendering

  • Volume rendering gracefully falls back on unsupported systems

[1.0.0] - 2025-01-25

Initial Release

Added

  • Project structure and repository setup

  • Core theoretical documents (CLT v1.1, v2.0)

  • LoomSense specification documents (v1-v3)

  • Basic requirements.txt

Planned

[1.2.0] - Future

  • Biological substrate models

  • Multi-scale coherence modeling

  • LoomSense experimental integration

[2.0.0] - Future

  • Collective consciousness regimes

  • Planetary-scale dynamics

  • Empirical validation frameworks
